title: Lost 18 LP, win 19 LP, then lost 24 LP.... Riot doesn't know wtf their system is doing.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
The title says it all.. I played a ranked, lost, lost 18 LP, then won the next game and gained 19 LP, then i lost the next game and lost 24 LP (The most I've ever lost all season, and just after I've been climbing)

So yea, don't believe any of that crap they give you about MMR, this shit is random and thats all there is to it.

replies.body: You lost kid whats the problem here? lmao

"this shit is random"

HEY EVERYONE, this guy posted on forums on his lvl 9 account that LP gains are totally random! 

.. ...

I don't think anyone cares, you're wrong......
The system is telling you to stay put in your current rank  ;^)

> So yea, don't believe any of that crap they give you about MMR

...it's because the MMR difference between the teams vary, man. Matchmaking tries to give you an even match (which would result in more consistent LP gains) but it can't always do that, so you'll get more or less LP to compensate for a harder or easier match.

Or you know, it's just random...
